scripts.setup: npm run clean && ./initialize.sh ${NETWORK:-testnet} && npm run build-contracts && npm install
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.build-contracts: soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/soroban_oracle_contract.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/oracle_id) --output-dir ./.soroban/oracle-contract --network "$(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/network)" --overwrite         && soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/btc_token.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/btc_token_id)  --output-dir ./.soroban/btc-token --network "$(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/network)" --overwrite          && soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/donation_contract.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/donation_id) --output-dir ./.soroban/donation-contract --network "$(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/network)" --overwrite
